mapper.select:
SELECT board_no as bno, board_title as btitle, board_writer as bwriter, board_hit as bhit, DATE_FORMAT(board_updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as bupdatetime, idx as idx FROM board
ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT board_no as bno, board_title as btitle, board_writer as bwriter, board_content as bcontent, board_hit as bhit, DATE_FORMAT(board_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d-%H:%i') as bdatetime, DATE_FORMAT(board_updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d-%H:%i') as bupdatetime, idx as idx FROM board WHERE board_no = #{bno}
